property.name: dataDir
property.description: the directory where the snapshot is stored.do not use /tmp for storage, /tmp here is just example sakes.

property.name: tickTime
property.description: The number of milliseconds of each tick

property.name: initLimit
property.description: The number of ticks that the initial synchronization phase can take

property.name: syncLimit
property.description: The number of ticks that can pass between sending a request and getting an acknowledgement

property.name: clientPort
property.description: the port at which the clients will connect

property.name: autopurge.snapRetainCount
property.description: The number of snapshots to retain in dataDir

property.name: autopurge.purgeInterval
property.description: Purge task interval in hours Set to "0" to disable auto purge feature
